import React, { Component } from 'react' import SelectFilter from './select' import AddArticle from './addArticle' import toggleOpenDecorator from '../decorators/toggleOpenDecorator' import logo from '../logo.svg' import Menu from './menu' class Header extends Component { render(){ return(

FOR THE VOICE

1910-1920

FOR THE VOICE

AVANGARD RUSSIAN BOOK

ASSOCIATIONS, GROUPS AND PUBLISHING HOUSES

{ this.openSelect } { this.openAdd }
) } get openSelect(){ return (this.state.isOpenSelect ? : null) } get openAdd(){ return (this.state.isOpenAdd ? : null) } } export default Header
